name: Joel Sherwood Spring
biography: Joel Sherwood Spring is a Wiradjuri anti-disciplinary artist, who works collaboratively on projects that sit outside established notions of contemporary art and architecture attempting to transfigure spatial dynamics of power through discourse, pedagogies, art, design and architectural practice. Joel is focused on examining the contested narratives of Australiaâ€™s urban cultural and Indigenous history in the face of ongoing colonisation.
